title: Momentum
content:
Momentum Effect Spurred on by sense of urgency. Movement Speed increased by 3m Removed when Restrained, Incapacitated, Prone or Slow down. Equipment Chain of Liberation Haste Helm Springstep Boots Spurred Band Speedy Reply
